name: Mahjong World Adventure - The Treasure Trails
name_original: Mahjong World Adventure - The Treasure Trails
description:
Mahjong World Adventure - The Treasure Trails is a digital board game developed by Beautiful Free Mahjong Games by Difference Games.
You can play Mahjong World Adventure - The Treasure Trails on Android. You can purchase the game on Google Play.
developers: Beautiful Free Mahjong Games by Difference Games
